pages.title: Orange Tip
pages.text: Anthocharis cardamines, the orange tip, is a butterfly in the family Pieridae, which contains about 1,100 species.$(br2)A. cardamines feeds on most plants found within its habitat but the females selectively oviposit on young inflorescence of crucifers.

pages.title: Orange Tip
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:dandelion$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
